text: Kogda zhe zavershatsya zapretnyye mesyatsy, to ubivayte mnogobozhnikov, gde by vy ikh ni obnaruzhili, berite ikh v plen, osazhdayte v krepostyakh i ispol'zuyte protiv nikh vsyakuyu zasadu. Yesli zhe oni raskayutsya, budut sovershat' salat, razdavat' zakat, to pust' idut svoyey dorogoy, ibo Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
